name: Lots of Blocks
description:
A game made for the brackeys game jam 2021.1.  The player can join together with other cubes to become stronger.

Hold esc or p to unlock the cursor.

Use the mouse to look around.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move around.

Press enter to pickup a cube.

The standalone version has better performance and the mouse input is less sensitive. The mouse input on the browser version is very sensitive, the mouse input on the standalone version is normal.
